questions.quote: Yes, I think I'm sponge-worthy. I think I'm very sponge-worthy.
Yeah, I made a map of my shortcuts. I'm gonna rock their world!
Oh, yeah, thanks.  Yeah, it's got the magic grip. How d'you think I bowled that two-twenty today, huh?  Yo! Where did this come from?
Listen, lemme ask you a question. What if I got a cup of coffee with her?
You know, you oughta go down there and help him out. He's a widower.
You like that, huh? I had that custom made for me in Santa Fe.
Well, this will really free up my time so I can focus on more important things, like my bladder system.
Really , like a... like a.... Jerry, I want to slide my tongue around you like a snake.....Ooooooooooha ,oooooohaaaa.....
Oh...yeah. I got my new plates. But they mixed them up. Somebody got mine and I got their *vanity* plates.
Latham, Massachusetts. Why don't you take a cab into town, get yourself something to eat. I got your beeper number - I'll beep you as soon as we're ready.
